article:
'FRESH' is an acronym for 'Focusing Resources on Effective School Health', an
inter-agency framework developed by UNESCO, UNICEF, WHO, and the World Bank,
launched at the Dakar Education Forum, 2000, which incorporates the experience
and expertise of these and other agencies and organizations. It is a worldwide
program for improving the health of school children and youths. [http://portal.unesco.org/education/en/ev.php-
URL_ID=35176&URL_DO=DO_TOPIC&URL_SECTION=201.html]
